name: Arms Dealer - War Tycoon Game
description:
Welcome to Arms Dealer - War Tycoon Game

You're here to become an Arms Dealer boss. Sounds cool, right? You've seen them in movies and heard about them in the news, now it's your turn.

Buy government contracts for guns, ammo, supplies, and vehicles and cash in big. It's a fine line between legal and illegal with gun trafficking. You'll be dealing on the black market to buy and sell weapons for the government. It's risky business. And be careful because not every contract is a good deal. Some will leave you losing money.

As you become a bigger arms dealer, you are going to have to upgrade your inventory and supplies capability. You'll outgrow your supply capabilities and won't be able to store all the inventory needed to fill contracts. As you manage more contracts and more weapons you'll find out that it's not easy, if you lose the contract you'll be out your money.

Being a gun dealer isn't easy, you'll be tested to see how well you manage your hustle. Feel like a boss and you execute bigger and bigger contracts. As a big-time arms dealer, you're be doing multimillion-dollar contracts racking in millions for yourself.

Your goal is to become the biggest arms dealer in the world! Do you have what it takes? If you do, get started now and prove it!
